About Me

BIO

Hi, I am Jean. A problem-solving Software Engineer with 2 yearsâ€™ experience working on Full Stack Web Development projects as part of and leading remote, agile, distributed, and cross-cultural engineering teams.

I also love teaching others. I am a volunteer Learning Facilitator, Mentor and Tech evangelist.

Skills: Python (Flask, Django), JavaScript, SQL, Agile Project Management, Mentorship, Test Driven Development, Holistic Big Picture Thinking and Continuous Learning.

HIVE COLAB

Learning Facilitator (11/19 - 02/20)

Hive Colab is an innovation hub, community owned, collaborative, co-working space for the Uganda's Technology community.

The following were my tasks and accomplishments;

  • Completed training curriculum for Uganda's first all-women IT training institute, WITI in record time.
  • Researched and provided for modern training techniques.
  • Facilitated, trained and judged 20+ women in tech at boot-camps and hackathons.
  • Creating of IoT projects to help guide learners
  • Events organization and execution of successful bootcamps for the learners in entrepreneurship and Internet Of Things

ANDELA

Software Engineer(02/19 - 10/19)

Andela is an American company with operational campuses in Africaincluding Nigeria, Ghana & Kenya that identifies and develops software developers. It hires only the top 1% of applicants and focuses on building better remote engineering teams.

The following were my tasks and accomplishments;

  • Led and worked with a team of 5 to deliver word-class features for 3 successful full-stack web projects.
  • Rotational Scrum Master that reviewed over 90% of all Pull Requests raised within teams.
  • On-boarded new developers onto the team and trained them on the product and process workflow.
  • Successfully tested over 85% of all my code contributions.

DFCU BANK

Electronic -Banking Officer (03/18 - 09/18)

DFCU is the 2nd largest bank in Uganda.

The following were my roles and responsibilities;

  • Onboarding new and existing customers onto the online banking platform..
  • Provided I.T troubleshooting support and solved multiple customer queries and challenges.
  • As a Direct Sales Representative, I went out, pitched to multiple clients both individuals and corporations, and closed the deals opening multiple accounts.
  • Exceeded expectations cold calling hundreds of clients for account reactivation .
  • Handled a large online portfolio of multiple companies and individuals.
